text:
RuqtAvA# dhaqrtA kRu#ShTIqnAmuqta maddhya# iqddhaH ||
sAqddhvIma#ka rdEqvavI#tiM nO aqdya yaqj~jasya# jiqhvAma#vidAmaq guhyA$M |
sa AyuqrA &gA$thsuraqBi rvasA#nO BaqdrAma#ka rdEqvahU#tiM nO aqdya ||
akra#ndadaqgniH staqnaya#nnivaq dyauH kShAmAq rEri#hadvIqrudha#H samaq~jjann | 
saqdyO ja#j~jAqnO vi hImiqddhO aKyaqdA rOda#sI BAqnunA# BAtyaqntaH ||
tvE vasU#ni purvaNIka - [  ] 25
